text: Scumbag. Mayo Cheat has no traction with POCs which might put a hard ceiling on his campaign’s growth in future primaries and caucuses.

THIS! The ability of Republicans to remain attached the Republican Party but insist they’re not racist, xenophobic in the face of state-sanctioned violence against all kinds of minority groups terrifies me. What scares me just as much is that almost none of the liberal whites I know will challenge the Republicans about any of this either.
